name: Sparc
description: Sparc is a vSport - a unique physical sport only possible in virtual reality, in which players compete in fast-paced, full-body VR gameplay and connect in an online community.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64bit or newer Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD FX4350 or greaterÂ  Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Additional Notes: Compatible HDMI 1.3 video output, 1x USB 3.0, 2x USB 2.0
